title: Polish forces use water cannons on Belarus border as migrants hurl stones
content:
1. Polish forces use water cannons on Belarus border as migrants hurl stones  The Washington Post
  2. Poland uses water cannon on hostile migrants throwing rocks at border: 'Force will be used'  Fox News
  3. Violence erupts on Poland-Belarus border as Polish guards fire water cannon on migrants throwing rocks  CNN
  4. Poland border crisis: Migrants tear-gassed trying to cross from Belarus  BBC News
  5. Body of young Syrian migrant buried in Poland as family watch by videolink  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
